Welcome to CasaNova: New Home, New Start.

CasaNova is an open-source web application designed to help young adults in their 20s confirm a realistic housing budget based on their current assets and income. Unlike traditional real estate platforms, CasaNova integrates and analyzes complex factorsâ€”such as DSR/DTI-emulating loan regulations and youth-targeted mock financial productsâ€”to support financially savvy and stable housing decisions.
